about_the_game:
"Picture toys" is an improved version of the traditional puzzle game, Added touch and graffiti features, Also supports creative workshops, Upload and download content from creative workshops, Can share pictures with each other !
DLC unlocks the creative workshop 18+ tag !

Game features

  • Jelly effect
  • Graffiti function
  • Support creative workshop, Can share pictures with each other
  • Traditional jigsaw puzzle
  • Can import images, support jpg, png format
  • F key to complete the puzzle quickly
  • Right mouse button automatic touch
  • Touch range R, touch intensity S, touch elasticity E can be adjusted

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked and pornographic content, All characters are over 18 years old

name: Picture toys - 18+ tag patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: DLC unlocks the creative workshop 18+ tag !
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
